Detailed Description

The class to provide base facility to access Contacts table, which is stored about Contacts brief introduction.

Such as "HAS_PHONE_NUMBER", "LAST_TIME_CONTACTED", "PHOTO_ID", and so on.

The following example demonstrates how to use this Contacts class.

 getColumn(){
     String id      = Contacts::_ID();
     String photoId = Contacts::PHOTO_ID();
 }

Definition at line 32 of file Contacts.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

gaia::content::Contacts::Contacts ( const Contacts &  o) [private]

Member Function Documentation

static const gaia::base::String gaia::content::Contacts::_ID ( ) [static]

Row ID.

Consider using LOOKUP_KEY instead.

static const gaia::base::String gaia::content::Contacts::CUSTOM_RINGTONE ( ) [static]

A custom ringtone associated with a contact.

Typically this is the URI returned by an activity launched with the ACTION_RINGTONE_PICKER intent.

static const gaia::base::String gaia::content::Contacts::DISPLAY_NAME_PRIMARY ( ) [static]

The display name for the contact.

It is the display name contributed by the raw contact referred to by the NAME_RAW_CONTACT_ID column.

static const gaia::base::String gaia::content::Contacts::HAS_PHONE_NUMBER ( ) [static]

An indicator of whether this contact has at least one phone number.

"1" if there is at least one phone number, "0" otherwise.

static const gaia::base::String gaia::content::Contacts::IN_VISIBLE_GROUP ( ) [static]

An indicator of whether this contact is supposed to be visible in the UI.

"1" if the contact has at least one raw contact that belongs to a visible group; "0" otherwise.

static const gaia::base::String gaia::content::Contacts::LAST_TIME_CONTACTED ( ) [static]

The timestamp of the last time the contact was contacted.

See markAsContacted(ContentResolver, long). Setting this field also automatically increments TIMES_CONTACTED. When raw contacts are aggregated, this field is computed automatically as the latest time contacted of all constituent raw contacts. Setting this field automatically changes the corresponding field on all constituent raw contacts.

static const gaia::base::String gaia::content::Contacts::LOOKUP_KEY ( ) [static]

An opaque value that contains hints on how to find the contact if its row id changed as a result of a sync or aggregation.

static const gaia::base::String gaia::content::Contacts::NAME_RAW_CONTACT_ID ( ) [static]

The ID of the raw contact that contributes the display name to the aggregate contact.

During aggregation one of the constituent raw contacts is chosen using a heuristic: a longer name or a name with more diacritic marks or more upper case characters is chosen.

Contacts& gaia::content::Contacts::operator= ( const Contacts &  o) [private]
static const gaia::base::String gaia::content::Contacts::PHOTO_ID ( ) [static]

Reference to the row in the ContactsContract.Data table holding the photo.

That row has the mime type CONTENT_ITEM_TYPE. The value of this field is computed automatically based on the IS_SUPER_PRIMARY field of the data rows of that mime type.

static const gaia::base::String gaia::content::Contacts::PHOTO_THUMBNAIL_URI ( ) [static]

A URI that can be used to retrieve the thumbnail of contact's photo.

This column is the preferred method of retrieving the contact photo.

static const gaia::base::String gaia::content::Contacts::PHOTO_URI ( ) [static]

A URI that can be used to retrieve the contact's full-size photo.

This column is the preferred method of retrieving the contact photo.

static const gaia::base::String gaia::content::Contacts::SEND_TO_VOICEMAIL ( ) [static]

An indicator of whether calls from this contact should be forwarded directly to voice mail ('1') or not ('0').

When raw contacts are aggregated, this field is automatically computed: if all constituent raw contacts have SEND_TO_VOICEMAIL=1, then this field is set to '1'. Setting this field automatically changes the corresponding field on all constituent raw contacts.

static const gaia::base::String gaia::content::Contacts::STARRED ( ) [static]

An indicator for favorite contacts: '1' if favorite, '0' otherwise.

When raw contacts are aggregated, this field is automatically computed: if any constituent raw contacts are starred, then this field is set to '1'. Setting this field automatically changes the corresponding field on all constituent raw contacts.

static const gaia::base::String gaia::content::Contacts::TIMES_CONTACTED ( ) [static]

The number of times the contact has been contacted.

See markAsContacted(ContentResolver, long). When raw contacts are aggregated, this field is computed automatically as the maximum number of times contacted among all constituent raw contacts. Setting this field automatically changes the corresponding field on all constituent raw contacts.
